Description: Omphalos of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior glazed streaky black (mostly worn) with added white and red bands around omphalos and on bowl; exterior: line at top of omphalos, broad band on wall at edge of omphalos and narrow band outside it.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 306, possibly no. 1215) (Number not precised)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1995) (phase 2)
